LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: And then, there was only darkness.

LABEL: 0x2E2
STRING: Everyone was silent.

LABEL: 0x306
STRING: I couldn't hear anything.

LABEL: 0x320
STRING: I didn't even think.

LABEL: 0x344
STRING: I couldn't.

LABEL: 0x35C
STRING: Dragged by the flickering meters and gauges, we returned to reality.

LABEL: 0x46C
STRING: The room was enveloped in a mysterious silence.

LABEL: 0x49A
STRING: It was like peering through a door to another world.

LABEL: 0x4C4
STRING: Like stepping into another time-space.

LABEL: 0x4EC
STRING: Everyone in the wheelhouse must have felt that strange sensation.

LABEL: 0x52C
STRING: In the end, that was――

LABEL: 0x619
STRING: 「――Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x633
STRING: 「What the hell... was that...?」

LABEL: 0x684
STRING: 「I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x6AF
STRING: Yukari shook her head from side to side, her expression still shocked.

LABEL: 0x707
STRING: The intense energy she'd displayed while communicating with the exploration ship was gone.

LABEL: 0x747
STRING: Like she had lost all focus.

LABEL: 0x773
STRING: We had all been overwhelmed by that unbelievable bioluminescence――

LABEL: 0x7A7
STRING: ――No.

LABEL: 0x7BF
STRING: That probably wasn't all.

LABEL: 0x7E7
STRING: Hiragino asked Yukari again.

LABEL: 0x822
STRING: 「Never mind those lights.」

LABEL: 0x842
STRING: 「What was that conversation with the exploration ship about?」

LABEL: 0x872
STRING: 「You know something important about this accident, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x95B
STRING: 「What is <Alice>?」

LABEL: 0xA0C
STRING: Seeing her hold her tongue, Hiragino furrowed his brow in frustration.

LABEL: 0xA57
STRING: 「To me... No.」

LABEL: 0xA71
STRING: 「Is there anything you can tell us?」

LABEL: 0xACE
STRING: 「There's nothing――」

LABEL: 0xB37
STRING: 「Is that true?」

LABEL: 0xBB7
STRING: Tokiwa spoke up suddenly.

LABEL: 0xBDB
STRING: Her eyes were still fixed far beyond the large window.

LABEL: 0xC13
STRING: Looking through to the other side, beyond the imperceptible space of existence...

LABEL: 0xC57
STRING: Words flowed out of her mouth as she stared into the distance.

LABEL: 0xD88
STRING: 「Is that true, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0xDAC
STRING: 「Aren't you lying?」

LABEL: 0xDCE
STRING: 「You mustn't lie.」

LABEL: 0xDEC
STRING: 「Lies... Only lies...」

LABEL: 0xE17
STRING: This was the same as back then...

LABEL: 0xE2F
STRING: Tokiwa didn't get angry when she heard that I'd tampered with the system of this ship.

LABEL: 0xE84
STRING: However, she relentlessly blamed me for using a false name.

LABEL: 0xEBE
STRING: It was the same thing now.

LABEL: 0xED6
STRING: She was not trying to judge Yukari's claims, but whether they were lies or not.

LABEL: 0xFFD
STRING: 「There's no record of bioluminescence like that in my intracranial library.」

LABEL: 0x1041
STRING: 「It's something that shouldn't exist in this world.」

LABEL: 0x10DC
STRING: 「However, that proposition turned out to be "false"――」

LABEL: 0x1110
STRING: 「The light exists... I made a mistake.」

LABEL: 0x1152
STRING: 「Wouldn't you be able to correct that mistake?」

LABEL: 0x1192
STRING: 「Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x1230
STRING: 「――I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x1257
STRING: She let out repeated words of denial.

LABEL: 0x1279
STRING: Tokiwa didn't turn back to face her. She just stared vacantly out the window.

LABEL: 0x12D0
STRING: 「Is that so?」

LABEL: 0x12EC
STRING: 「Nevertheless, concealing things is unforgivable.」

LABEL: 0x131C
STRING: 「This wheelhouse exists under that condition.」

LABEL: 0x1357
STRING: Condition...?

LABEL: 0x136F
STRING: I was not entirely sure if I understood what she was trying to say.

LABEL: 0x13DB
STRING: Yukari put a hand to her forehead and leaned against the wall.

LABEL: 0x14F0
STRING: 「Momoi, are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x1521
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x1541
STRING: 「Just... give me a little time.」

LABEL: 0x156F
STRING: 「I need time to think...」

LABEL: 0x15D0
STRING: Yukari closed her eyes and stood still, deep in thought.

LABEL: 0x15FE
STRING: I could see deep wrinkles carved between her eyebrows.

LABEL: 0x1622
STRING: That must have been a sign of the responsibility and pressure she'd carried all by herself until now.

LABEL: 0x16D7
STRING: A chief attendant...

LABEL: 0x16F9
STRING: And a member of ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x171B
STRING: For our sake...

LABEL: 0x1737
STRING: And for the sake of the organization.

LABEL: 0x1767
STRING: If the two sides were to be at odds...

LABEL: 0x1800
STRING: I wondered how much anguish she must feel as she carried the expectations of both.

LABEL: 0x1844
STRING: Yukari might be hiding something from us.

LABEL: 0x187E
STRING: But even if she was, would we really have the right to blame her?

LABEL: 0x196F
STRING: The fleet remained silent, having lost its destination.

LABEL: 0x199D
STRING: Reiri was the first to show her intention to leave.

LABEL: 0x1A98
STRING: 「Reiri-kun, where are you going?」

LABEL: 0x1B2A
STRING: 「I've had enough fun.」

LABEL: 0x1BA9
STRING: 「I'm going back to my room to sleep.」

LABEL: 0x1BF2
STRING: 「Ah, Reiri, wait.」

LABEL: 0x1C33
STRING: Reiri turned to leave without saying anything more.

LABEL: 0x1C5B
STRING: Touri chased after her.

LABEL: 0x1C88
STRING: 「You can't!」

LABEL: 0x1CA9
STRING: An angry voice echoed through the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x1CC9
STRING: Her lips trembled, still in the same position as before.

LABEL: 0x1D6F
STRING: 「Please don't leave this room without my permission!」

LABEL: 0x1DA9
STRING: 「That's an order.」

LABEL: 0x1DCE
STRING: Reiri let go of the door and spun around.

LABEL: 0x1E08
STRING: The look on her face――

LABEL: 0x1F0B
STRING: 「Are you in any position to give out orders?」

LABEL: 0x1F56
STRING: 「What are you talking about?」

LABEL: 0x1F8D
STRING: 「I'm wondering how much your words are worth right now.」

LABEL: 0x202E
STRING: 「How much power they have.」

LABEL: 0x20E7
STRING: Yukari hesitated.

LABEL: 0x2101
STRING: Reiri's mouth turned into a smile.

LABEL: 0x213E
STRING: 「If we listen to you, obey you, and entrust our lives to you...」

LABEL: 0x2182
STRING: 「Will we be saved as a result?」

LABEL: 0x2228
STRING: 「...That's what I'm trying to do.」

LABEL: 0x2254
STRING: 「In order to do that, I'm giving you orders and also restricting your actions.」

LABEL: 0x22A0
STRING: 「It's all in order for all of us to return to the surface alive――」

LABEL: 0x22ED
STRING: 「In that case, it's fine to tell us, right?」

LABEL: 0x2328
STRING: Her tone was terribly cold and dismissive.

LABEL: 0x235C
STRING: But, I could picture she felt some joy in finding someone in a similar situation as her.

LABEL: 0x23A2
STRING: Reiri was still under suspicion herself and would have been treated more harshly if not for Touri.

LABEL: 0x2404
STRING: I wondered if she was enjoying this situation.

LABEL: 0x2485
STRING: 「...Tell us what exactly?」

LABEL: 0x24B4
STRING: Reiri was still staring at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x24E4
STRING: Looking down on her.

LABEL: 0x25CD
STRING: 「Let me tell you.」

LABEL: 0x25ED
STRING: 「She's hiding something from us――」

LABEL: 0x263A
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x2661
STRING: 「What?!」

LABEL: 0x267E
STRING: 「Wha―」

LABEL: 0x2723
STRING: Yukari drew everyone's attention, save for Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x2755
STRING: There was suspicion in all of our stares...

LABEL: 0x277F
STRING: To varying degrees, no one looked at her the same way anymore.

LABEL: 0x27CD
STRING: She had been placed under suspicion...

LABEL: 0x27F7
STRING: However, when she closed her eyes, she exhaled deeply and looked up at us.

LABEL: 0x289F
STRING: 「...I'm asking you to stay in the wheelhouse for now.」

LABEL: 0x28D7
STRING: 「Whether or not there are any lies in what I've told you is another matter.」

LABEL: 0x2913
STRING: 「It's dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x2931
STRING: 「Currently, there's a possibility that there's a survivor inside the <SHEEP III> other than us.」

LABEL: 0x298E
STRING: 「Until we know who they are and what they're planning, please refrain from acting on your own.」

LABEL: 0x2A56
STRING: 「A survivor other than us, huh?」

LABEL: 0x2A85
STRING: Reiri mocked her serious attitude.

LABEL: 0x2ACC
STRING: 「Is something funny?」

LABEL: 0x2B5E
STRING: 「If there are survivors, why haven't they shown themselves?」

LABEL: 0x2B9E
STRING: 「They hid on this ship,

LABEL: 0x2BC8
STRING: with no way of getting back to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x2BF6
STRING: 「What do you suppose their goal is?」

LABEL: 0x2C81
STRING: 「Does someone like that really exist?」

LABEL: 0x2CBE
STRING: So that's what she was saying.

LABEL: 0x2CE4
STRING: I looked at Reiri's neck, who was staring at Yukari like a snake.

LABEL: 0x2D26
STRING: Those dark-red marks were still on her porcelain-white skin.

LABEL: 0x2D58
STRING: I couldn't help but think back to that tragic scene under the sprinklers.

LABEL: 0x2DAD
STRING: 「Isn't this "someone" just a convenient excuse for you to restrict our actions?」

LABEL: 0x2E20
STRING: 「That's not――」

LABEL: 0x2EB9
STRING: 「Aren't you yourself proof that this "someone" exists?」

LABEL: 0x2F07
STRING: 「That scar on the back of your neck!」

LABEL: 0x2F27
STRING: 「They were the one who strangled you yesterday――」

LABEL: 0x2F68
STRING: 「Momoi!」

LABEL: 0x2FBD
STRING: Yukari was startled.

LABEL: 0x2FD9
STRING: She was stopped by Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x2FF3
STRING: The truth was that Reiri had been strangled and almost killed.

LABEL: 0x3035
STRING: To bring it up to her like this was...

LABEL: 0x3138
STRING: 「...I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x31B5
STRING: 「You may not remember, but...」

LABEL: 0x31EB
STRING: 「Yesterday, we found you lying unconscious, strangled by someone.」

LABEL: 0x3244
STRING: Yukari sounded apologetic.

LABEL: 0x3270
STRING: Reiri's expression, however, didn't change at all.

LABEL: 0x32B1
STRING: 「I don't think so.」

LABEL: 0x32E4
STRING: 「As I said...」

LABEL: 0x336E
STRING: 「――You people are annoying.」

LABEL: 0x33EB
STRING: 「I'm no match for your persistence.」

LABEL: 0x341B
STRING: 「What does it matter if I was attacked?」

LABEL: 0x345F
STRING: Reiri smiled like she'd had enough while we were quiet.

LABEL: 0x3497
STRING: In stark contrast to her withered smile, she let out a cold voice.

LABEL: 0x34E1
STRING: 「I guess I should tell you.」

LABEL: 0x350B
STRING: 「If you're looking for my strangler, they're right here.」

LABEL: 0x3543
STRING: 「That's why it's safer outside than here in this wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0x357D
STRING: 「Was there something else?」

LABEL: 0x35A6
STRING: The culprit was in here...?

LABEL: 0x3604
STRING: I reflexively surveyed the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x3630
STRING: Yukari, Hiragino, Touri, Tokiwa... and me.

LABEL: 0x366A
STRING: There was no way any of us was the culprit.

LABEL: 0x36AC
STRING: Objectively speaking, I was the most suspicious one here.

LABEL: 0x373B
STRING: But, I had an alibi.

LABEL: 0x3767
STRING: When Reiri was discovered, I was in the playroom with the others.

LABEL: 0x37AB
STRING: If this was an attempt to trap me, it was pretty sloppy.

LABEL: 0x37E7
STRING: Why did Reiri tell us that?

LABEL: 0x381D
STRING: She――

LABEL: 0x3892
STRING: 「What are you talking about...?」

LABEL: 0x3928
STRING: 「Not that it matters to me.」

LABEL: 0x39B7
STRING: 「More importantly, I think that's enough.」

LABEL: 0x39E7
STRING: 「Let me rest already.」

LABEL: 0x3A2E
STRING: She spat out the words, growing impatient.

LABEL: 0x3A5E
STRING: Her irritation was plain on her face, which had been sneering at us not too long ago.

LABEL: 0x3B79
STRING: 「Wait a minute, Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x3BFE
STRING: 「Who on earth strangled you?」

LABEL: 0x3C34
STRING: 「If you know, then tell us.」

LABEL: 0x3CCA
STRING: 「...Touri.」

LABEL: 0x3CE9
STRING: She recited her sister's name in a tedious manner.

LABEL: 0x3D7F
STRING: 「Can we talk alone?」

LABEL: 0x3DBC
STRING: 「Yeah, sure.」

LABEL: 0x3E39
STRING: 「――Everyone's fine with that, right?」

LABEL: 0x3E61
STRING: 「Let's go, Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x3E8E
STRING: 「Wait, you two――」

LABEL: 0x3EF1
STRING: But it was already too late.

LABEL: 0x3F1B
STRING: The two of them had already walked out of the wheelhouse and left.

LABEL: 0x3F55
STRING: 「H-Hey.」

LABEL: 0x3F6F
STRING: As I watched them leave, I thought about what Reiri had said.

LABEL: 0x3FC9
STRING: Her sudden accusation...

LABEL: 0x3FEB
STRING: What was the point of that?

LABEL: 0x400F
STRING: Was it just a makeshift lie?

LABEL: 0x403B
STRING: That seemed reasonable to me, but then again, it was also risky to tell a lie that could be easily exposed.

LABEL: 0x40F8
STRING: And...

LABEL: 0x4110
STRING: The way she spoke made it sound as though she was certain of something.

LABEL: 0x415A
STRING: Only Reiri knew the truth.

LABEL: 0x4184
STRING: ...In which case, I'd just have to ask her.

LABEL: 0x427D
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x429E
STRING: 「I'm going after Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x4336
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x4357
STRING: 「What is it!?」

LABEL: 0x4393
STRING: Why are you stopping me?!

LABEL: 0x43B1
STRING: I couldn't help but raise my voice as Yukari stubbornly held me back.

LABEL: 0x43E9
STRING: Turning around and glaring at her with all my might, Yukari repeated herself weakly.

LABEL: 0x4499
STRING: 「I told you, you can't...」

LABEL: 0x44C5
STRING: 「How many times do I have to tell you...」

LABEL: 0x4550
STRING: 「――Outside of this room is...」

LABEL: 0x4594
STRING: 「It's already too late...」

LABEL: 0x45E1
STRING: Her voice faded into thin air.

LABEL: 0x4607
STRING: She looked hopeless as she thought about something by herself again.

LABEL: 0x4641
STRING: She didn't seem to be able to think straight.

LABEL: 0x46D5
STRING: 「...Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x46F1
STRING: 「――Tell me what happened.」

LABEL: 0x471F
STRING: 「I don't have a clue what's going on anymore.」

LABEL: 0x4759
STRING: 「Neither the communication with the surface nor Reiri's words make any sense to me.」

LABEL: 0x47A5
STRING: 「What are you keeping to yourself?」

LABEL: 0x4847
STRING: 「...It's not something I should be telling you.」

LABEL: 0x488A
STRING: 「You――」

LABEL: 0x48AA
STRING: 「――Certainly, given your position, you might have to take responsibility for what happens here in the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x4919
STRING: 「You have to worry not only about our safety, but about ROMLES as well.」

LABEL: 0x4969
STRING: 「That might still be the case even after the accident, but...」

LABEL: 0x49B3
STRING: 「Still, you should have more faith in us.」

LABEL: 0x4A0A
STRING: 「He's right.」

LABEL: 0x4B08
STRING: 「I can understand why you're being so stubborn.」

LABEL: 0x4B36
STRING: 「...Well, there are some things I don't understand, but...」

LABEL: 0x4B72
STRING: 「Even so...」

LABEL: 0x4BEB
STRING: 「No, that's exactly why I want you to trust us more.」

LABEL: 0x4C93
STRING: 「Even you...」

LABEL: 0x4CBA
STRING: 「It's weird for me to say this, but...」

LABEL: 0x4CEC
STRING: 「We're sharing the same fate at the bottom of this sea...」

LABEL: 0x4D2A
STRING: 「We're sharing a deep bond that won't lose to the sea... or something like that.」

LABEL: 0x4DD1
STRING: Yukari's eyes widened.

LABEL: 0x4DEF
STRING: I knew I was saying something pretty embarrassing.

LABEL: 0x4E61
STRING: But it was the truth.

LABEL: 0x4E7F
STRING: There were no falsehoods in my words or in my heart.

LABEL: 0x4EA7
STRING: We were partners.

LABEL: 0x4EC7
STRING: If we didn't cooperate, there was no way we'd be able to escape from this sea floor.

LABEL: 0x4F05
STRING: You mustn't be bound by duty or responsibility, Yukari.

LABEL: 0x4F3D
STRING: So, please...

LABEL: 0x5048
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x5066
STRING: 「――Your sister was a great person.」

LABEL: 0x50A1
STRING: 「Yukari-san――」

LABEL: 0x50CC
STRING: 「Compared to her, you're the worst.」

LABEL: 0x5187
STRING: 「――Partners?」

LABEL: 0x51A3
STRING: 「What are you talking about?」

LABEL: 0x5238
STRING: 「You were the one who created this hopeless situation!」

LABEL: 0x52E8
STRING: 「Hey, Yukari――」

LABEL: 0x5372
STRING: 「All of this is your doing.」

LABEL: 0x53A8
STRING: 「The <SHEEP III> sank because of you.」

LABEL: 0x53E1
STRING: 「You faked your name, hid your identity, and tampered with the program...」

LABEL: 0x542B
STRING: 「What you did was a crime.」

LABEL: 0x54B4
STRING: 「How many people do you think died because of you?」

LABEL: 0x5500
STRING: 「If it weren't for you, none of this would have happened.」

LABEL: 0x557A
STRING: 「Because of you――」

LABEL: 0x559D
STRING: She ran out of breath and collapsed.

LABEL: 0x55CD
STRING: Hiragino supported her from behind.

LABEL: 0x5665
STRING: 「You're going too far, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x56E4
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun, don't worry about it.」

LABEL: 0x5719
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x574D
STRING: ...I had nothing to say in response.

LABEL: 0x5773
STRING: I was grateful to Hiragino, but what Yukari had said was the undeniable truth.

LABEL: 0x57CB
STRING: I was the cause of everything...

LABEL: 0x57ED
STRING: And the one who had to bear all the responsibility for what I'd done was none other than her, the chief attendant.

LABEL: 0x584D
STRING: It was normal for her to hold a grudge against me.

LABEL: 0x5887
STRING: No matter how much I tried to make things right, I was the one who ruined the maiden voyage of the <SHEEP III>――

LABEL: 0x58E0
STRING: Me...

LABEL: 0x5907
STRING: 「Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x5981
STRING: Tokiwa――

LABEL: 0x5999
STRING: She had been silent up until now, unconcerned by the recent series of events.

LABEL: 0x59DD
STRING: She gazed off into the distant darkness at the other side of the window.

LABEL: 0x5A21
STRING: Not paying attention to the clamor of the human world, but only to the truth...

LABEL: 0x5A7F
STRING: And that girl now spoke to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x5B78
STRING: 「He's definitely a terrible person, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x5BAC
STRING: 「He's lied about a lot of things and gives young girls dirty looks...」

LABEL: 0x5C00
STRING: 「Those deeds are bad no matter how you spin it.」

LABEL: 0x5C36
STRING: 「He's one of the worst people in the world.」

LABEL: 0x5C66
STRING: 「But, he didn't know this was going to happen.」

LABEL: 0x5CB5
STRING: My help came from an unexpected source.

LABEL: 0x5CDB
STRING: Her words sounded like insults, but I could tell she was protecting me.

LABEL: 0x5D44
STRING: 「It doesn't make sense for Katagiri-san to bear full responsibility.」

LABEL: 0x5D85
STRING: Tokiwa, who insisted firmly, was probably not trying to help me to begin with.

LABEL: 0x5DDF
STRING: She was searching for the right thing.

LABEL: 0x5E01
STRING: Searching for the truth.

LABEL: 0x5E1D
STRING: Whatever that meant for me was secondary. She was purely looking for an answer.

LABEL: 0x5E75
STRING: Faced with those clear, unclouded eyes, even Yukari would falter.

LABEL: 0x5F52
STRING: She trailed off, unable to argue back.

LABEL: 0x5F7C
STRING: Tokiwa continued without following Yukari's awkwardly averted eyes.

LABEL: 0x6032
STRING: 「Also...」

LABEL: 0x604C
STRING: 「There's something that's been bothering me.」

LABEL: 0x6086
STRING: 「――About the cause of this accident.」

LABEL: 0x60B2
STRING: 「You said it was an explosion of methane hydrate.」

LABEL: 0x60EE
STRING: 「But, is that really true?」

LABEL: 0x611D
STRING: 「...What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x6143
STRING: The direct cause of the damage that sank the <SHEEP III> to the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x617E
STRING: According to Yukari, it was because the equilibrium of methane hydrate at the bottom of the sea had collapsed and caused an explosion...

LABEL: 0x61E8
STRING: Don't tell me even that was a lie?

LABEL: 0x6227
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x6243
STRING: 「It was only a theory, but I think it's very plausible.」

LABEL: 0x627C
STRING: She answered with some difficulty.

LABEL: 0x629C
STRING: Tokiwa's pursuit did not stop there.

LABEL: 0x62D3
STRING: 「You need material to formulate a theory.」

LABEL: 0x6307
STRING: 「What did you base yours on?」

LABEL: 0x6340
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x635C
STRING: 「...It was a result of referencing various data.」

LABEL: 0x63FA
STRING: 「And what kind of data was that?」

LABEL: 0x6424
STRING: 「Could you show me?」

LABEL: 0x646B
STRING: 「...That's not something I can freely show to others.」

LABEL: 0x64C2
STRING: 「Isn't it a little late to be saying things like that?」

LABEL: 0x653B
STRING: With that, Tokiwa spread her arms wide.

LABEL: 0x6577
STRING: Everyone present was startled by her sudden action.

LABEL: 0x65B1
STRING: Watching the reactions of those around her, Tokiwa began spinning around on the spot.

LABEL: 0x6667
STRING: 「It's been bugging me ever since I heard it...」

LABEL: 0x66B3
STRING: 「I wonder if there are any methane hydrate reserves in the waters around here in the first place.」

LABEL: 0x672C
STRING: 「There's no way you'd know that...」

LABEL: 0x67CE
STRING: 「Long ago, I used to look into this area too, you know?」

LABEL: 0x681D
STRING: She spun around and around, weaving her words.

LABEL: 0x6859
STRING: Her words danced in the irregular rhythm of her mysterious steps.

LABEL: 0x690B
STRING: 「Well, let's say there was an accumulation of methane hydrate, as you said.」

LABEL: 0x695D
STRING: 「If that was the case...

LABEL: 0x69D0
STRING: Hmm?」

LABEL: 0x6A43
STRING: 「Oh, that's right...」

LABEL: 0x6A6F
STRING: 「There's data like this.」

LABEL: 0x6AA2
STRING: She slowly stopped.

LABEL: 0x6ACE
STRING: Staggering, she stuck one arm into the sleeve of her kimono.

LABEL: 0x6B74
STRING: 「There's...」

LABEL: 0x6BED
STRING: 「Data...」

LABEL: 0x6CBC
STRING: 「Like this...?」

LABEL: 0x6D9B
STRING: 「Ah, there it is.」

LABEL: 0x6DD1
STRING: After rummaging around for a while, she pulled out a familiar-looking reader.

LABEL: 0x6E30
STRING: 「That's from the library...」

LABEL: 0x6EC6
STRING: 「Yes, you're correct.」

LABEL: 0x6F05
STRING: It was the info terminal meant for passengers that was placed in the library.

LABEL: 0x6F39
STRING: It was a small handheld reader for perusing electronic information.

LABEL: 0x6F6F
STRING: When did she snatch that...?

LABEL: 0x6F97
STRING: Tokiwa stuck out her tongue without a hint of guilt.

LABEL: 0x6FD1
STRING: ...It was detestable how well-defined her facial features were.

LABEL: 0x7020
STRING: 「Now then, take a look at the data inside.」

LABEL: 0x7055
STRING: As she spoke, I accepted the reader she was offering.

LABEL: 0x708D
STRING: Displayed on it were various numbers and graphs.

LABEL: 0x70B5
STRING: Could this be――

LABEL: 0x70D3
STRING: 「Is this... the design data for the <SHEEP III>?!」

LABEL: 0x7176
STRING: 「...Right. Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x71F8
STRING: 「I'm surprised you noticed.」

LABEL: 0x7221
STRING: She looked rather proud of herself as she confirmed my suspicions.

LABEL: 0x7251
STRING: 「Still, when did you get your hands on this...?」

LABEL: 0x72F7
STRING: 「It was yesterday.

LABEL: 0x7360
STRING: I was able to access a lot of data thanks%Nto Yukari-san's authority.」

LABEL: 0x73A8
STRING: Her authority... That dongle, huh?

LABEL: 0x73D2
STRING: She was given that dongle for a time in order to check the pressure resistance limit of the diving suits.

LABEL: 0x741A
STRING: As long as she had that, she should have been able to use Yukari's authority to peek at all the information on this ship.

LABEL: 0x7472
STRING: Still, I couldn't believe that she was able to do all that in the limited time she had while calculating the pressure resistance...

LABEL: 0x754E
STRING: 「Rare information is good, after all.」

LABEL: 0x7580
STRING: 「Better than medium or well-done. Rare.」

LABEL: 0x761B
STRING: 「And so, I had a mountain of data in my hands before I knew it.」

LABEL: 0x7670
STRING: I wasn't sure what all "before she knew it" entailed, but...

LABEL: 0x76A8
STRING: We now knew how she got her hands on this data.

LABEL: 0x76FA
STRING: Once again, she stuck out her tongue with an expression devoid of remorse.

LABEL: 0x774C
STRING: Yukari's clenched hands trembled as she watched her.

LABEL: 0x7875
STRING: 「You did something like that?!」

LABEL: 0x7905
STRING: 「Now, now.」

LABEL: 0x791F
STRING: 「Don't get too worked up. Please 『cool down.』」

LABEL: 0x79B7
STRING: She used English for some reason.

LABEL: 0x79D9
STRING: In contrast to Yukari's anger, Tokiwa's actions were all over the place.

LABEL: 0x7A34
STRING: 「Don't worry, it won't leak out.」

LABEL: 0x7A60
STRING: 「We're disconnected from all networks, after all.」

LABEL: 0x7AF9
STRING: 「『All OK.』」

LABEL: 0x7B56
STRING: She made an OK hand sign with both hands while explaining.

LABEL: 0x7B8E
STRING: That was lame.

LABEL: 0x7BA2
STRING: Her incomprehensible behavior made it hard to follow what she was talking about.

LABEL: 0x7BF0
STRING: What the hell was Tokiwa trying to say?

LABEL: 0x7C33
STRING: 「Could you get to the point...?」

LABEL: 0x7CD5
STRING: 「Oh, that's right.」

LABEL: 0x7D52
STRING: 「Based on this data from earlier, taking into account the shock resistance of the <SHEEP III>――」

LABEL: 0x7D9B
STRING: 「A little bit of methane hydrate wouldn't be enough to make a hole. Not even a single window would break.」

LABEL: 0x7E05
STRING: 「This ship shouldn't sink unless there was a more powerful explosion, in other words.」

LABEL: 0x7E9B
STRING: 「Isn't there actually some other reason why we sank?」

LABEL: 0x7F53
STRING: 「For example...」

LABEL: 0x7FCC
STRING: 「――Maybe there was a problem with the ship itself?」

LABEL: 0x801D
STRING: Problem with the ship...?

LABEL: 0x8043
STRING: A ship that was destined to sink.

LABEL: 0x8075
STRING: A coffin that was meant to be from the beginning.

LABEL: 0x80A9
STRING: A sinking prison.

LABEL: 0x8122
STRING: If that was true, then...

LABEL: 0x8148
STRING: Everyone who died――

LABEL: 0x816C
STRING: And we, who were left behind――

LABEL: 0x82BA
STRING: 「――Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x82D6
STRING: 「You mustn't lie.」

LABEL: 0x8326
STRING: Tokiwa was cornering her.

LABEL: 0x8346
STRING: Unable to say anything, Yukari bit her lip.

LABEL: 0x837D
STRING: 「Is that true, Momoi?」

LABEL: 0x83A4
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x83F8
STRING: I could feel everyone's distrust building up.

LABEL: 0x841E
STRING: And at the center of it was Yukari.

LABEL: 0x84C3
STRING: She was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x84DD
STRING: Having lost her position,

LABEL: 0x84F7
STRING: our trust,

LABEL: 0x8511
STRING: having lost everything, she looked terribly frail.

LABEL: 0x8557
STRING: There was no trace left of her former proudness.

LABEL: 0x85B1
STRING: There were four people in the wheelhouse, including her.

LABEL: 0x85DD
STRING: I had no idea what Tokiwa was thinking as she stared at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x8627
STRING: Touri and Reiri were probably resting in their room right about now.

LABEL: 0x8661
STRING: This wasn't a falling out, per se...

LABEL: 0x868D
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x86A5
STRING: Where had we gone wrong?

LABEL: 0x86D9
STRING: How had it come to this?

LABEL: 0x8715
STRING: We were at the bottom of the sea,

LABEL: 0x8731
STRING: without anything to rely on.

LABEL: 0x8751
STRING: And we still couldn't trust each other despite sharing the same cruel fate.

LABEL: 0x87F4
STRING: 「Nee-san...」

LABEL: 0x8810
STRING: If it were her――

LABEL: 0x882C
STRING: I wondered what my sister would have done at a time like this.

LABEL: 0x8862
STRING: I had no doubt that we wouldn't be falling apart like this, at least.

LABEL: 0x88B6
STRING: But, if...

LABEL: 0x88D2
STRING: If she were to find herself in a situation like this, she...

LABEL: 0x8904
STRING: My sister would――

LABEL: 0x898A
STRING: 「H-Hey, Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x89C5
STRING: 「What are you...?」

LABEL: 0x89EE
STRING: I slowly fell to my knees.

LABEL: 0x8A10
STRING: I put both of my palms on the floor and lowered my forehead between them.

LABEL: 0x8A48
STRING: To put it plainly, I was prostrating myself.

LABEL: 0x8A6C
STRING: 「It's true that I'm the worst kind of person there is.」

LABEL: 0x8A92
STRING: 「If I hadn't done what I did, all this wouldn't have happened.」

LABEL: 0x8ADA
STRING: 「Compared to my sister... I'm a total failure.」

LABEL: 0x8B26
STRING: If it were her...

LABEL: 0x8B44
STRING: Even if I thought about it... I couldn't know.

LABEL: 0x8B7C
STRING: I was not my sister.

LABEL: 0x8BA0
STRING: So I had to do what I could.

LABEL: 0x8BD4
STRING: 「I'm no good.」

LABEL: 0x8BFC
STRING: 「I lied, and regardless of the truth, there's no mistaking that I'm one of the causes of this accident.」

LABEL: 0x8C50
STRING: 「But... I want to survive.」

LABEL: 0x8C7C
STRING: 「I want to get out of here with all of you.」

LABEL: 0x8CA2
STRING: 「To that end, I want to know what's happening right now.」

LABEL: 0x8CE0
STRING: 「Please... Tell us the truth.」

LABEL: 0x8D0C
STRING: 「Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x8D33
STRING: 「I'm asking you too.」

LABEL: 0x8D56
STRING: Hiragino's voice drew near me as I bowed my head.

LABEL: 0x8D8C
STRING: I could tell that he was kneeling on the floor as well.

LABEL: 0x8DD3
STRING: 「Momoi, you're not the only one responsible for everyone's lives.」

LABEL: 0x8E13
STRING: 「I also have to protect the lives of the people here as a doctor.」

LABEL: 0x8E6E
STRING: 「Both of you, raise your heads already!」

LABEL: 0x8EA3
STRING: Yukari yelled at us impatiently.

LABEL: 0x8EE1
STRING: 「I beg of you!」

LABEL: 0x8F08
STRING: 「Momoi, please!」

LABEL: 0x8F39
STRING: 「I get it! I understand!」

LABEL: 0x8F6D
STRING: 「Just... Please stop doing that!」

LABEL: 0x8FB0
STRING: She finally broke――

LABEL: 0x902B
STRING: When I heard her voice and looked up, my eyes met hers.

LABEL: 0x9063
STRING: She gave me an exasperated look and sighed heavily.

LABEL: 0x911D
STRING: 「I'll... tell you what I know.」

LABEL: 0x9151
STRING: 「That said――」

LABEL: 0x91CC
STRING: 「Knowing it won't help you.」

LABEL: 0x920F
STRING: 「That's fine.」

LABEL: 0x9231
STRING: 「I want to know.」

LABEL: 0x9251
STRING: 「So how about it, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x9305
STRING: 「...Understood.」

LABEL: 0x9327
STRING: 「Let's talk...」

LABEL: 0x9365
STRING: 「――About everything.」

LABEL: 0x9386
STRING: Her words were filled with resignation.

LABEL: 0x93B0
STRING: Yukari passed between us and opened the door of the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x93EC
STRING: 「Where are you going?」

LABEL: 0x941D
STRING: 「It's going to be a long story, so let's go somewhere else.」

LABEL: 0x9453
STRING: 「――To the theater room.」
